Class Candidate

  • java.lang.Object
    • Candidate

  • public class Candidate
extends java.lang.Object

    Candidate

    Purpose

    The Candidate class provides a object model of candidates that participate in elections.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Candidate(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String party)
      Intializes a Candidate instance with the parameters specified.

      Method to update (1) the total number of votes and (2) number of added/subtracted votes since last round that a Candidate instance currently possess as of the most recently finished round

        Returns:
